segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s talk about your dependents. Do you have anyone in mind that you want to add? Just their name would be helpful for now.
segments.client_message: Yeah, I’ve got a son. His name is Jake, and he was born on the 15th of March, 2018. So, I guess I should mention him as my dependent, right?

segments.advisor_message: Exactly! That sounds perfect. Just to clarify, how long will Jake be considered a dependent? Do you know if it’s until he turns 18 or maybe a bit longer?
segments.client_message: Um, I’m not totally sure. I think it might be until he’s 21, but I’ll have to check that. Can I just say 21 for now?
